JOHN MOORE
Windward Road P,0
D.S.A, FITZRITSON O.B.E. J.P
Tel: 33342
Cable:
ARAWAK KINGSTON
31 Duke Street
Kingston
B. P. SCOUTS MEMORIAL HEADQUARTERS
Doncaster, Windward Rd. P.O.
Kingston, Jamaica, B.W.I.
Your Reference.
10th. .February.,.w.5.6..
In Reply Please Quote No.
C/o Cosmopolitan Assurance Co,,Ltd,,
86 Church Street,
Kingston,
Jamaica, B#W.I*
228 North La Salle Street,
Chicago, Illinois,
U.S.A.
Dear Sirs,
Recently I have been assigned the honorary job of organising
Musical Programmes, Broadcasts and Sports for the Bqys Scouts
Assoftiata cart-nf - Jamaica. ---
Wanting to do as best a job as possible and especially in
Broadcasting, of which I know veiy little, I write to ask if
you could send me any Pamphlets, Folios or general information
that would help me,
I feel certain any material you send will be of use and
so await your favour and earliest reply.
1
